Text: it wont play, it keeps saying, The program cant start because binkw32.dll is missing from your computer, is that a file that you forgot to add or did i do something wrong?

@blueface nobody is to blame, you must download binkw32.dll from ggl and place it into folder where Alan Wake is installed. Also place bink file into System folders in WINDOWS folder. Then restart and try. You will get instructions anyway.
